summary.span: 使用 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML)，提供針對載入影像最佳化的特殊化 。

span.span: Provides a specialized that is optimized for loading images using Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要是為了支援存在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法與點陣圖載入的是未定義所導入其他屬性。 primarily exists to support [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax and introduces additional properties for bitmap loading that are not defined by . 實作最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 只有在物件初始化期間，才會發生屬性變更。Property changes can only occur during object initialization. 呼叫發出信號，初始設定開始和來表示已完成初始設定。Call to signal that initialization has begun and to signal that initialization has completed. 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。After initialization, property changes are ignored. 使用建立的物件建構函式會自動初始化，而且屬性變更會被忽略。 objects created using the constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和程式碼。The following code examples demonstrate how to use a in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-xaml[ImageElementExample#SimpleXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml#simplexaml2)] [!code-xaml[ImageElementExample#SimpleXAML2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml#simplexaml2)] [!code-csharp[ImageElementExample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml.cs#simplecsharp1)] [!code-vb[ImageElementExample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml.vb#simplecsharp1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至如果您想要關閉用來建立資料流。Set the to if you wish to close a stream used to create the . 預設值快取選項會保留存取的資料流，直到所需的映像及清理工作由記憶體回收行程。The default cache option retains access to the stream until the image is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定的使用程式碼。The following code example demonstrates how to set the of a by using code. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （它們可能不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DecodePixelHeight { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定影像解碼成的高度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.

value.span: 影像解碼成的高度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果也已經設定，則會忽略點陣圖的長寬比。If is also set, the aspect ratio of the bitmap is ignored. 如果未設定，外觀比例將保持不變。If is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]轉碼器原生將影像解碼成指定的大小; 其他轉碼器解碼其原始大小的影像，並調整所需大小的影像。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定使用程式碼的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. [!code-csharp[BitmapImageProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapImageProps/CSharp/BitmapImageProps.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BitmapImageProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapImageProps/VB/BitmapImageProps.vb#1)]

[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]轉碼器原生將影像解碼成指定的大小; 其他轉碼器解碼其原始大小的影像，並調整所需大小的影像。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定使用程式碼的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 旋轉後調整執行。Rotation is performed after scaling. 這表示，具有的映像的、為 10，和為 5 會導致影像的寬度為 5，10 的高度。This means that an image that has a of , a of 10, and of 5 will result in an image that has a width of 5 and a height of 10. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用旋轉影像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和程式碼。The following code example demonstrates how to rotate an image by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-xaml[ImageElementExample#TransformedXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/TransformedImageExample.xaml#transformedxaml2)] [!code-csharp[ImageElementExample#TransformedCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/TransformedImageExample.xaml.cs#transformedcsharp1)] [!code-vb[ImageElementExample#TransformedCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/TransformedImageExample.xaml.vb#transformedcsharp1)]
